headline.print_headline: Cloud-Based Nutanix Soars, Gaining 131% After I.P.O.
headline.main: Nutanix, a Cloud-Based Business, Soars in I.P.O.

snippet: Shares of the company, one of the few venture capital-backed start-ups with a valuation greater than $1 billion to go public this year, more than doubled....
lead_paragraph: Shares of the company, one of the few venture capital-backed start-ups with a valuation greater than $1 billion to go public this year, more than doubled.
